Package com.safetynet.alerts.repository

Class JsonRepository

java.lang.Object
com.safetynet.alerts.repository.JsonRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataRepository
@Repository public class JsonRepository extends Object implements DataRepository
A class that communicates with a data source (repository): a Json file. It reads the content and injects it into POJOs. It contains all the API's CRUD-specific methods.
Version:
1.0
Author:
SÃ©bastien Cappon
Singularity :
Contains manually implemented intermediate logs (DEBUG and WARN) to make it easier to monitor operations carried out on the API.
